connector.description: Query and/or transform XML payloads using XQuery and Saxon.

camel.sink.path.resourceUri.name: camel.sink.path.resourceUri
camel.sink.path.resourceUri.description: The name of the template to load from classpath or file system

camel.sink.endpoint.allowStAX.name: camel.sink.endpoint.allowStAX
camel.sink.endpoint.allowStAX.description: Whether to allow using StAX mode

camel.sink.endpoint.headerName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.headerName
camel.sink.endpoint.headerName.description: To use a Camel Message header as the input source instead of Message body.

camel.sink.endpoint.namespacePrefixes.name: camel.sink.endpoint.namespacePrefixes
camel.sink.endpoint.namespacePrefixes.description: Allows to control which namespace prefixes to use for a set of namespace mappings

camel.sink.endpoint.resultsFormat.name: camel.sink.endpoint.resultsFormat
camel.sink.endpoint.resultsFormat.description: What output result to use One of: [Bytes] [BytesSource] [DOM] [DOMSource] [List] [String] [StringSource]

camel.sink.endpoint.resultType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.resultType
camel.sink.endpoint.resultType.description: What output result to use defined as a class

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.configuration.name: camel.sink.endpoint.configuration
camel.sink.endpoint.configuration.description: To use a custom Saxon configuration

camel.sink.endpoint.configurationPropert.name: camel.sink.endpoint.configurationProperties
camel.sink.endpoint.configurationPropert.description: To set custom Saxon configuration properties

camel.sink.endpoint.properties.name: camel.sink.endpoint.properties
camel.sink.endpoint.properties.description: Properties to configure the serialization parameters

camel.sink.endpoint.staticQueryContext.name: camel.sink.endpoint.staticQueryContext
camel.sink.endpoint.staticQueryContext.description: To use a custom Saxon StaticQueryContext

camel.component.xquery.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.component.xquery.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.xquery.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.xquery.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.xquery.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.xquery.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.xquery.configuration.name: camel.component.xquery.configuration
camel.component.xquery.configuration.description: To use a custom Saxon configuration

camel.component.xquery.configurationProp.name: camel.component.xquery.configurationProperties
camel.component.xquery.configurationProp.description: To set custom Saxon configuration properties
